Using Requirement Filters

Filtering allows you to limit the types and numbers of requirements that appear in the upper pane. StarTeam includes default filters, but if desired you can customize filters and create new ones. See Creating a Filter.

To control the data shown on the upper pane, select a filter from the Filter drop-down list box on the toolbar. The information displayed in the requirements list also depends upon:

  • The folder you have selected from the left pane

  • The selection of the All Descendants button from the toolbar.

StarTeam requirement filters include:

<Show All>

Displays all the requirements.

Flagged Items

Lists only requirements that have been flagged.

Grouped by Creator

Displays groups of requirements, one group for each user who has created requirements.

Grouped by Status

Displays groups of requirements, one group for each existing status.

I Am Responsible

Displays only the requirements for which you are responsible.
